A few exercises in creating data frames. 

# 1

```{r}
df <- data.frame(
  'a' = c(seq(1:5)),
  'b' = c(seq(11:15))
)
```


# 2

```{r}

col1 <- c(seq(1:5))
col2 <- c(seq(11:15))
df2 <- data.frame(
  'a' = c(col1),
  'b' = c(col2)
)
```
